data.title: WWE 2K24 Match Types List, Weapons & Custom Rules
data.meta_description: WWE 2K24 will feature a wide variety of Match Types, with up to 8 wrestlers in the ring at the same time. On this page, you can find all the WWE 2K24 Match...
data.text:
WWE 2K24 will feature a wide variety of Match Types, with up to 8 wrestlers in the ring at the same time. On this page, you can find all the WWE 2K24 Match Types available in the game.

Also, with the Custom Matches / Match Creator feature in WWE 2K24, players can create and save their own match types with a customized set of rules.

WWE 2K24 New Match Types

WWE 2K24 finally delivers four new, chaotic match types: Special Guest Referee, Ambulance Match, Casket Match, and Gauntlet Match.

The Special Guest Referee match makes its long-awaited return in WWE 2K24. The special referee can be AI-controlled or player-controlled. The match type can be played only in 1 on 1 match types, both offline and online. Players have the power to officiate an entire match, and to cause a little mayhem such as the ability to call for a DQ when a DQ wasn't warranted, or say that someone tapped out when they didn't.

In addition, the Backstage Brawl now features 4-player support and new interactive environmental elements - including a working elevator, breakable control room glass, and a vending machine with throwable sodas.

Also, Double-Title Matches make their return in WWE 2K24, and the Royal Rumble now offers support for eight online players in 30-Superstar online matches.

Plus, all of the familiar WWE 2K match types, such as WarGames, Extreme Rules, TLC, Submission, Hell in a Cell, and many more are featured in the game.

WWE 2K24 Match Types List:

Below you can find the full list of all the Match Types included in WWE 2K24.

Note: Elimination variants for all match types can be set in Match Rules / Custom Matches; Managers can be added to most match types.

WWE 2K24 Match Options:

When setting up a match, you can set various match options:

Custom Match Rules (see below)

Select Arena (see WWE 2K24 Arenas Full List)

Title Match (Select Championship)

Double-Title matches are now possible NEW

MITB Management

Select Referee

In WWE 2K24, seven real WWE referees are featured to add to the immersive experience

Special Bar (Slow / Normal / Fast)

Finisher Bar (Slow / Normal / Fast)

Entrance (On / Off)

Edited/Created Superstars (Allowed / Not Allowed)

WWE 2K24 Match Rules & Custom Matches:

The Custom Matches & Match Rules feature in WWE 2K24, formerly known as Match Creator, lets you create a custom set of rules for a match, save them as Custom Match Types, and use them in Exhibition and WWE Universe.

You can, of course, also simply customize these rules on the fly before starting a regular match, without the need of saving it as a separate match type.

Below you find the full list of Match Rules and options available for Custom Matches in WWE 2K24:

Win Conditions

Pin Or Submission (Both; Pin Only; Submission Only; Off)

2 out of 3 Falls

Iron Man

Over The Top Rope

K.O. (Knockout)

Last Man Standing

Finisher Match (Perform Finisher To Win)

First Blood

Climb Out Of The Cage (Cage Match Only)

Force Opponent To Exit Cage (WarGames Only)

Trap Opponent in Object NEW

Match Rules

DQ (Disqualification)

Rope Break (Automatic)

Ring Out (10 Count; 20 Count; No Count; No Ring Out)

Elimination

Falls Count Anywhere

Time Limit

Entrance Run-In

Mid Match Run-In

Post Match Run-In

Entrance Interval (Royal Rumble / Elimination Chamber)

Vitality Recover Between Falls NEW

Match Settings

Finishers (Match Start)

Default Health (Low; Medium; High)

Steel Cage Type (Steel; Black; Blue; Scrap Trap)

Hell In A Cell Type (Current; Classic)

WWE 2K24 Weapons List (Custom Weapon Wheel)

In WWE 2K24, the Weapon Wheel is available in every match and it's customizable. You can pick the weapons that will appear under the ring in each of the 6 slots, by choosing among these weapons:

Baseball Bat

Chair

Kendo Stick

Ladder

Sledgehammer

Stop Sign

Table

Hockey Stick

Shovel

Trash Can NEW

Guitar NEW

Microphone NEW

La Chancla (Flip Flops) NEW

Slim Jim NEW

Barbed Wire Bat NEW Patch 1.08

Light Tube NEW Patch 1.08

Door NEW Patch 1.08

In addition to the ability to perform taunts with a weapon, which was added last year, WWE 2K24 features the return of the ability to throw weapons.
